channel.title: Player Saving
channel.description: Why dose it like 75% of the time a person logs in and out too fast it resets their account? dose anyone know what this is happening?

item.title: Player Saving
item.dc:creator: @squal707 squal707
item.description:
@squal707 wrote:

[quote=“aftereffect, post:1, topic:157910”][quote author=xdarklight.x link=topic=215258.msg1877423#msg1877423 date=1194603895]

no im talking bout this…

case 9154: //Log out
                                        {
						logout();
                                                savemoreinfo();
						savechar();
						LogoutDelay = 10;
                                        }

means they have to wait 10 seconds before logingout wich should be enough to save there file.

O ill try that…
[/quote]
Why do you have braces/brackets floating in the middle of no where?[/quote]

cuase moparscape did that =\ its fine when its in my client.java but when i post on here the spaces are messed up…

Read full topic

no im talking bout this…

case 9154: //Log out
                                        {
						logout();
                                                savemoreinfo();
						savechar();
						LogoutDelay = 10;
                                        }

means they have to wait 10 seconds before logingout wich should be enough to save there file.

savemoreinfo();
